00018         {
00019             Response.Redirect("view_print_run.aspx");
00020         }

00027         protected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)
00028         {
00029             if (Session["PWAS_run_id"] != null)
00030             {
00031                 int runID = System.Int32.Parse(Session["PWAS_run_id"].ToString());                                
00032                 IOrderRepository orderRepository = RepositoryFactory.Get<IOrderRepository>();
00033 
00034                 var query = from p
00035                             in orderRepository.Orders
00036                             where p.runID == runID
00037                             select p;
00038 
00039                 foreach (var current_order in query)
00040                 {
00041                     TableRow row = new TableRow();
00042 
00043                     TableCell cellOrderID = new TableCell();
00044                     TableCell cellJobName = new TableCell();
00045                     TableCell cellPrice = new TableCell();
00046                     TableCell cellQuantity = new TableCell();
00047                     
00048 
00049 
00050                     cellOrderID.Controls.Add(new LiteralControl(current_order.orderID.ToString()));
00051                     cellJobName.Controls.Add(new LiteralControl(current_order.job_name.ToString()));
00052                     cellPrice.Controls.Add(new LiteralControl(String.Format("{0:C}",current_order.price.ToString())));
00053                     cellQuantity.Controls.Add(new LiteralControl(current_order.quantity.ToString()));
00054                     
00055                     //pixels
00056                     
00057                     cellOrderID.Width = Unit.Pixel(100);
00058                     cellJobName.Width = Unit.Pixel(200);
00059                     cellPrice.Width = Unit.Pixel(150);
00060                     cellQuantity.Width = Unit.Pixel(150);
00061                     
00062 
00063                     //Center
00064                     
00065                     cellQuantity.HorizontalAlign = HorizontalAlign.Center;
00066                     cellOrderID.HorizontalAlign = HorizontalAlign.Center;
00067                     cellPrice.HorizontalAlign = HorizontalAlign.Center;
00068                     
00069                                         
00070                     row.Cells.Add(cellOrderID);
00071                     row.Cells.Add(cellJobName);
00072                     row.Cells.Add(cellQuantity);
00073                     row.Cells.Add(cellPrice);
00074                     
00075                     
00076                     row.CssClass = "orderRow";
00077 
00078                     this.PrintRunTableView.Rows.Add(row);
00079                     
00080                 }
00081             }
00082             else
00083             {
00084                 Response.Redirect("view_print_run.aspx");
00085             }
00086 
00087         }
00088     }
